alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 01 at 8:50PM CST until January 02 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...South Itasca, North Cass, Koochiching, North Itasca, South Cass, Crow Wing, Northern Aitkin and South Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas and the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...Until noon CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Koochiching; North Cass; North Itasca; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass; South Itasca
